price: Sema: Hakika mimi ninaogopa adhabu ya Siku Kubwa nikimuasi Mola wangu Mlezi.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ إِنۡ عَصَيۡتُ رَبِّي عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ
footnotes: Sema: Mimi naogopa adhabu ya Siku Kubwa yenye vitisho ikiwa nitamuasi Mola wangu Mlezi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qul innī akhāfu in ʿaṣaytu rabbī ʿadhāba yawmin ʿaẓīmin
